name: Koch recursion simulation
tagline: This is a testing page for a Koch recursive function simulation for my Introduction to 3D Computer Graphics course using HTML and JavaScript.
body:
### Koch Recursion
This is for assignment 1 of EECS 3431: Introduction to 3D Computer Graphics. My job was to write a simple interactive program that draws the recursive square Koch curve. Throughout this project, I learned how to transform objects using WebGL and linear algebra (more of matrices...)

### Authors and Contributors
This project is created by @dianalee1022
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
